survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Fitness Equipment
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with indoor fitness equipment purchased in the last 12 months.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor fitness equipment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor fitness equipment?

questions.question_text: Which types of indoor fitness equipment have you used in the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of indoor fitness equipment have you used in the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your indoor fitness equipment?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on potential improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your indoor fitness equipment?

questions.question_text: How often do you use your indoor fitness equipment per week?
questions.client_notes: Frequency data helps assess product engagement.

script.question_text: How often do you use your indoor fitness equipment per week?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your indoor fitness equipment to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) can be derived from this question.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your indoor fitness equipment to others?
